availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Catharine Jane Martin Viley (Married Warren Viley)

body.p: Born in Woodford County, Kentucky. Married Warren Viley, brother-in-law of Provincial Governor George Washington Johnson. Lived in Scott County, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for Catharine Jane Martin Viley (1821-1886), Find A Grave Memorial # 98984089, Georgetown Cemetery, Georgetown, Scott County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=98984089 (accessed 12 Aug 2017).
"Maj. Viley. Famous Kentucky Turfman Dies at Midway, Louisville *Courier-Journal, 20 Jan 1902, 2. ProQuest Historical Newspapers.
